posts.post_content:
Posted By: brian p
Selling a group of 24 lower grade T206's (On Hold) and a group of 7 lower grade T206's with punch holes (available).   First email on the available group gets them...shipping is included with all sales.

Lot of 24 w/Huggins (hands at mouth), Joss(pitching), and Chase (black cap throwing) - $290.00 - ON HOLD

Lot of 7 (all with punch holes) includes McGraw - $75.00
